_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The five qualities that a mendicant shou: Well established mindfulness inside themselves in order to understand the arising and passing away of phenomena
Meditates observing the ugliness of the body
Perceives dissatisfaction with the whole world
Observes the impermanence of all conditions
